headline: Lennox Donates Over 400 Heating and Cooling Units to Homeowners and Nonprofits in Need Across North America
summary: Lennox Residential HVAC donated 402 heating and cooling (HVAC) units to homeowners and nonprofits in need through its Feel The Love program sponsored by the LII Lennox Foundation. During Installation Week, October 3–12, Lennox dealers across 46 U.S. states and several Canadian provinces volunteered their time and expertise to install HVAC units at no cost.

content.title: Lennox Donates Over 400 Heating and Cooling Units to Homeowners and Nonprofits in Need Across North America
content.summary: Lennox Residential HVAC donated 402 heating and cooling (HVAC) units to homeowners and nonprofits in need through its Feel The Love program sponsored by the LII Lennox Foundation. During Installation Week, October 3–12, Lennox dealers across 46 U.S. states and several Canadian provinces volunteered their time and expertise to install HVAC units at no cost.

thumbnail.caption: Feel The Love, sponsored by the LII Lennox Foundation, brings free Lennox HVAC installations to community organizations like Halo Adoption Center.
